ai-atk-abh03a3:1_0: Questioning the meaning of that good dissolution,
ai-atk-abh03a3:2_0: The Teacher, having taught the relics, gave (saying):
ai-atk-abh03a3:3_0: the victor’s flame is brought lamps,
ai-atk-abh03a3:4_0: Whatever person is wise, he is the best,
ai-atk-abh03a3:5_0: After renowned his fame, now he came to fame,
ai-atk-abh03a3:6_0: That’s why I shall listen to him.
